from pathlib import Path
import glob
data_dir = Path(''data/train'')
pattern = ''*.jsonl''
jsonl_files = list(data_dir.glob(pattern))
print(f''Found {len(jsonl_files)} files'')
print(''First 5 files:'', [f.name for f in jsonl_files[:5]])
")
